summary: Portishead is an English rock band formed in 1991 in Bristol. The band includes Beth Gibbons (vocals), Geoff Barrow (many instruments), and Adrian Utley (guitar). Their debut album, "Dummy" (1994), mixed hip-hop beats with spy movie-like sounds and sad vocals. It was very popular and important for the trip-hop genre. Though they don't like the label, their other albums "Portishead" (1997) and "Third" (2008) were also highly praised. They also released a live album, "Roseland NYC Live" (1998).
title: Portishead (band)
